# remove(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a given player item from the queue.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func remove(_ item: AVPlayerItem)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The player item to remove from the queue.

## Discussion

If the item is currently playing, calling this method has the same effect as calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuePlayer/advanceToNextItem()] method.

## Managing the player queue

- **items()**: Returns an array of the currently enqueued items.
- **advanceToNextItem()**: Ends playback of the current item and starts playback of the next item in the player’s queue.
- **canInsert(_:after:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can insert a player item into the player’s queue.
- **insert(_:after:)**: Inserts a player item after another player item in the queue.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all player items from the queue.
